==Abyssal Moon Spire==
===Floor 11===
* '''Ley Line Disorder'''
** All characters in the party gain a 75% {{Color|Anemo DMG Bonus}}.
* '''Additional Effects'''
** In Chamber 2's First Half, The Pyro Abyss Mage is empowered with a {{Pyro}} Aura which inflicts characters with '''Smouldering Flames'''.
** In Chamber 2's First Half, The Fatui Skirmisher - Cryogunner Legionnaire is empowered with a {{Cryo}} Aura which spawns an Ice Cage every once in a while.
** In Chamber 2's Second Half, The Hydro Abyss Mage is empowered with a {{Hydro}} Aura which inflicts characters with '''Slowing Water'''.
** In Chamber 2's Second Half, The Fatui Skirmisher - Hydrogunner is empowered with a {{Hydro}} Aura which spawns Mist Bubbles every once in a while.
** In Chamber 3's First Half, one of the Fatui Pyro Agents is empowered with a {{Pyro}} Aura which inflicts characters with '''Smouldering Flames'''.
** In Chamber 3's Second Half, The Mirror Maiden is empowered with a {{Hydro}} Aura which inflicts characters with '''Slowing Water'''.

===Floor 12===
* '''Ley Line Disorder'''
** For this floor only, the ley line flow will be normal.
* '''Additional Effects'''
** In Chamber 1's First Half, there is a {{Pyro}} Elemental Node that applies a massive resistance and attack buff to enemy units until the status has been removed with {{Hydro}} attacks.
** In Chamber 1's Second Half, there is a {{Electro}} Elemental Node that applies a massive resistance and cooldown buff to enemy units until the status has been removed with {{Pyro}} or {{Cryo}}.
